China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 20 日星期二 07:00:09 GMT 120
Top watchdogs tell China's finance sector to follow Communist Party valuesChina's top financial watchdogs vowed to keep up a campaign to ensure that the sector adheres to Communist Party values and serves the economy while avoiding "excessive" and "reckless" risks, the party's official newspaper said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:36:46 GMT PWV3KREESJPBDA4ZVDUELNV55I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/top-watchdogs-tell-chinas-finance-sector-follow-communist-party-values-2024-02-20/Joe Cash可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
BAIC's EV brand to launch first Huawei-backed sedan in 2024BAIC BluePark New Energy Technology , the electric vehicle arm of Beijing Automotive Group (BAIC) , plans to launch its first sedan in partnership with Huawei Technologies this year, as Huawei steers into the EV market. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:26:12 GMT BCC3HI2A25J3NJ4ER4CXAASWTU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/baics-ev-brand-launch-first-huawei-backed-sedan-2024-2024-02-20/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Philippines joint air patrol with U.S. to 'protect territory'A joint air patrol by the Philippines with the United States was aimed at protecting territory and national interests in the South China Sea, a Philippine military official said Tuesday, after Beijing accused Manila of stirring up trouble. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:20:35 GMT B2ELWV75DFPFLNRQ4Q4662HVRM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-joint-air-patrol-with-us-protect-territory-2024-02-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
US asset managers ready for China recovery with products stacked upThree straight years of losses from Chinese markets and anti-Beijing rhetoric from Washington have not deterred some U.S. asset managers from introducing products they hope will thrive if Chinese stocks rebound. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:08:30 GMT CWY5K2CNSFIONI4NAQC4EYK4TI https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-asset-managers-ready-turn-china-sentiment-with-products-stacked-up-2024-02-20/Suzanne McGee, Megan Davies市场ETF
Tibet Airlines finalises orders for 40 C919, 10 ARJ21 jets from China's COMACChina's Tibet Airlines on Tuesday finalised an order for 40 C919 and 10 ARJ21 jets from COMAC designed to be suitable for high-altitude plateaus, becoming the launch customer for a new variant the Chinese state-owned planemaker is developing. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 03:37:05 GMT CDJ3GQXAPRM2LAUBFECPXB6HBI https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/tibet-airlines-finalises-orders-40-c919-10-arj21-jets-chinas-comac-2024-02-20/Brenda Goh商业航空航天与国防
Taiwan says China triggered 'panic' by boarding tourist boatThe boarding of a Taiwanese tourist boat by China's coast guard near sensitive frontline islands triggered "panic" among Taiwan's people, a government minister said on Tuesday, but Taiwan's military added it was not planning to get involved. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 02:21:50 GMT 4KHIFI5JU5NBNP5X7IMH5GNT44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-minister-says-china-coast-guard-triggers-panic-by-boarding-taiwan-tourist-2024-02-20/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
